divs: Sighting DetailsI woke up at 1:19am and it was very bright in the bedroom. I kinda think that's what woke me up. I didn't think much about it so I went on the back porch to smoke a cigarette. I didn't even smoke the whole thing and I went back to bed, and when I looked at the clock it said 3:30. I thought it was really strange, but went back to sleep anyway. In the am, I remembered that I had a really strange dream about a strange disk in the sky above the neighbors house. I just stared at it till I saw it rotate slightly and I realized it was real! I didn't feel any different in the morning, and my clothes weren't on inside out or backwards or anything. I did notice an itchy bump at the base of my skull a day later, and when I scratched it off... I got a really bad headache like nothing ever before! And I have migrains so I know it was not that. I didn't really give it much thought, untill I saw a story on the news a few days later about several people reporting a ufo south of where I live. Then tonight my friend and I saw an orange throbbing light bobbing through the night sky! But I'll make a seperate report for that one! Looks like something is going on that they might take interest in!
Summary: Strange disk hovering above the neighbors house to the back.
trends: There have been 67 other sightings in Independence

This sighting has never been favorited.
